name: Data Mafia Dash Note
author: Data Mafia

sections.description:
You have a blog on WordPress. Good job.

You have a few people adding content. They keep calling and email you on the same damn things. “What width should i make
images to have them fit full page, what is the link for the google docs, what are your drop box emails, where is the
logo for the site kept?”

Dash Note provides a dashboard widget with full editor capability to keep users up to date. Almost as if a MOTD for the
dash board. Hmm, that would have been a good name.

When activated there is a “Dash Note” link on the Dashboard menu. This link takes you to the WYSIWYG editor with not one
but TWO SAVE BUTTONS!
sections.installation:
Contact me directly and hire Data Mafia (LLC) for obscene (up front) cash

OR

  1. Upload datamafia-dashnote folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Sit back and enjoy. Consider making a donation?!
sections.faq:
Are you as cool as you say you are?

More so.

short_description: Dash Note is a simple editable admin dashboard widget for presenting Wordpress contributors key information.

screenshots.caption: Placement of the Dash Note link in the left admin menu and the (dragged) and dropped Dash note in action.  Notice the cape, total super hero!
The editor for Dash Note. I woudl imageine this looks familiar except I let it go wide.
